INKCAZELO:

INkqubo Yokushishina ngezoKhenketho (TEP) linyathelo lokuqala leNgxowa-mali yezoShishino. Le nkqubo izalisekiswa ziinkampani nabantu abaqeshelwe oko leli phondo.

Eyona njongo iphambili ye-TEP kukukhuthaza nokubhexesha ukukhula nokwanda kweshishini lezokhenketho. Incedisa abasebenzisi abakhulu, abazalisi-zimali, ii-SMME namaShishini awathi ngenxa yocalu-calulo lweli lizwe acinezeleka ekuphawulweni kothungelwano olunokwenzeka okanye amathuba ezoshishino. Kuye kurhwetywe oovimba ekwenzeni eli thuba ukuba libe yimpumelelo. Oku kuye kuquke ukuncedisa i-SMME ukuba ifumane iinkonzo ezisisigxina eziyimfuneko ezingezi zilandelayo:
* Isiqinisekiso esisemgangathweni se-ISO/SABS
* Imali yamatyala nezabelo zamashishini ezingenanzala imisiweyo
* Isicwangciso esifanelekileyo soshishino
* Ukupakisha
* Iingcebiso zomthetho
* Izidingo zobugcisai
* urhwebo.

I-TEP ineNgxowa-mali yoQeqesho noNcedo kwiMisebenzi yezoBugcisa (i-TTAF) nethi isetyenziswe ngokwesiseko sokwabelana ngamaxabiso kunye neshishini.
